comment._content:
Luther Almus Cook
Position: Rightfielder 
Bats: Left, Throws: Right 
Height: 6' 0", Weight: 170 lb.
Born: June 24, 1886 in Witt, TX 
School: Vanderbilt University (All Transactions)
Debut: August 7, 1913 
Team: Yankees 1913-1916
Final Game: April 25, 1916 
Died: June 30, 1973 in Lawrenceburg, TN 
Buried: Lawrence County Memorial Gardens,in Lawrenceburg, TN

comment._content: Senor Ryan:  Thanks for the additional info. on Ryan.  We'll add his full name to the record next time we update.
